column23: I found it hard to wind down and relax. My mind was constantly racing with thoughts about my work.
column24: I didn't have difficulty in swallowing, although there were times when I felt a lump in my throat due to stress.
column25: I couldn't seem to find any enjoyment in the things I did. Everything felt empty and unfulfilling.
column26: I wasn't aware of the action of my heart without physical exertion.
column27: I felt down-hearted and blue most of the time. It was hard to find any lightness in my mood.
column28: I found that I was often irritable. Small things would easily set me off and affect my interactions with others.
column29: I felt I was close to panic frequently. The constant pressure and strained relationships were overwhelming.
column30: I found it hard to calm down after something upset me. It would take me a while to regain my composure.
column31: I didn't fear being "thrown" by unfamiliar tasks, although I did feel some anxiety in facing new challenges.
column32: I was unable to become enthusiastic about anything. The lack of motivation and energy drained me.
column33: I found it difficult to tolerate interruptions to what I was doing. They would derail my focus and frustrate me.
column34: I was in a state of nervous tension most of the time. It felt like a constant weight on my shoulders.
column35: I felt pretty worthless. The strained relationships and lack of respect made me doubt my abilities and self-worth.
column36: I wasn't intolerant of anything that kept me from my work, but I did prefer to stay focused and avoid distractions.
column37: I didn't feel terrified, but there were moments of intense anxiety and fear about the future.
column38: I had a hard time seeing anything hopeful about the future. It all seemed uncertain and meaningless.
column39: I felt that life was often meaningless. The constant struggles and lack of fulfillment were overwhelming.
column40: I found myself getting agitated frequently. The stress and strained relationships took a toll on my emotions.
column41: I worried about situations where I might panic or embarrass myself. The fear of failure and judgment weighed on me.
column42: I didn't experience trembling in my hands.
column43: I found it difficult to work up the initiative to do things. The lack of motivation and constant exhaustion held me back.
